title: BRAND NEW 1BED/1BATH IN PILSEN
posting_body: This gorgeous 1bed 1 bath is freshly new are ready for YOU!!
Located in the heart of Chicago, the renovated unit has a brand new oven, stove, refrigerator, and an in-unit washer/dryer!
The grey hardwood floors compliment the stunning white cabinetry.
The soft-grey walls tie it all in & large windows provide plenty of natural light to complement the interior.
This property is located in an ideal area of Chicago.
The unit is a 4-minute drive to the I-90 W/I-94 W highway and a 4 minute walk (0.2 miles) to the Red Line CTA stop.
-Credit score of 600 and a steady monthly income.(or co-signer)
-No prior evictions or collections with Utility Companies
-First month rent is due at lease signing
This unit is beautiful and ready for great qualified tenants.
If you would like to schedule a viewing contact Sandy at 8479702541 by TEXT
